title: EnendarEnu nInenna
sahitya:
EnendarEnu nInenna kAyO nIne nanagendendu tande tAyo


caraNam 1    Apattu kAlakke ananta nI kAyo tApa jvarake trivikramane kAyo 
bhUpatiyu munidare shrIpatiye nI kAyo vyApAra dharmavanu yadupatiye kAyo
    caraNam 2    sarUpa suttidare sarvOttamane nI kAyo paripariya dOSagaLa padmanAbha kAyo 
haraku samsAravanu hari bandu nI kAyo dorakadI vELeyali dore nIne kAyo
    caraNam 3    nararu munidiralu nArAyaNane nI kayo pura bennukoLalu puruSOttamane kAyo 
ariyu aTTAdare acyutane nI kAyo karakareya samsAra krSNa nI kAyo
    caraNam 4    madamatsaravanu madhusUdanane nI kAyo madabanda vELeyali mAdhavane kAyo 
hrdayadA kapaTava hrSIkEsha nI kAyo odagida kalmaSava vAsudEva kAyo
    caraNam 5    kArpaNya dOSagaLa sarpashayanane kAyo oppuva prakAshava kEshavane kAyo 
appa tirumalarAya purandara viTTalane oppi anavarata niscinteyanu kAyo
